adc_averaging.docs:
**, integer**: Selects ADC sample averaging count. Defaults to `4`. Valid values are `1`, `4`, `16`, `64`, `128`, `256`, `512`, `1024`.

*See also: [INA226 DC current and power sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina226.html#configuration-variables)*

adc_time.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time) or both of the following nested options**: The time in microseconds to perform a single ADC conversion. Defaults to `1100us`. Valid values are `140us`, `204us`, `332us`, `588us`, `1100us`, `2116us`, `4156us`, `8244us`.
  * **voltage** (**Required**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)): ADC conversion time for Bus Voltage
  
  * **current** (**Required**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)): ADC conversion time for Shunt Voltage (Current measurement)
  
  

*See also: [INA226 DC current and power sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina226.html#configuration-variables)*

current.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: ADC conversion time for Shunt Voltage (Current measurement)

*See also: [INA226 DC current and power sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina226.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: ADC conversion time for Bus Voltage

*See also: [INA226 DC current and power sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina226.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**, integer**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x40`.

*See also: [INA226 DC current and power sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina226.html#configuration-variables)*

max_current.docs:
**, float**: The maximum current you are expecting. ESPHome will use this to configure the sensor optimally. Defaults to `3.2A`.

*See also: [INA226 DC current and power sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina226.html#configuration-variables)*

shunt_resistance.docs:
**, float**: The value of the shunt resistor on the board for current calculation. Defaults to `0.1 ohm`.

*See also: [INA226 DC current and power sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina226.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [INA226 DC current and power sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina226.html#configuration-variables)*
